EmailTemplate.description: Email Template to send when Puppy Registration has been approved
EmailTemplate.name: Puppy Registration Approved
EmailTemplate.subject: PuppyForce :You Puppy Registration has been Approved
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Congratulations!!
You Puppy has been approved. Now you you should be able to make a reserve to Location to bring your puppy to work.
PuppyForce Team
